Here is an example of how disc chips alter the combining % results:

bowwow/kato w/ mew disc chip
monster%
bowwow26
mew22
kato22
tiger18
blue kato12


w/o mew chip
monster%
kato27
tiger23
bowwow20
blue kato15
mew15


it also works when a mew is the 2d monster:

kato/bowwow w/ mew chip
monster%
kato34
blue kato21
mew16
bowwow16
tiger13


kato/bowwow w/o mew chip
kato41
blue kato26
tiger15
bowwow9
mew9

Combining charts by Torey Luvullo
